description: A React component for managing Confluence spaces, allowing users to search for and create spaces through a UI that invokes external API tools.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Asynchronous function to search Confluence spaces using provided tenant, connector IDs, and query, updating the state with the results or error messages.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Asynchronous function to create a new Confluence space with specified tenant, connector IDs, and query as the space name, updating the state with the result or error messages.
